dmca.title: COPYRIGHT VIOLATION XOXOP.COM (bbs.xoxop.com (65.75.129.106)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: moonangel@dslextreme.com [mailto:moonangel@dslextreme.com] 
Sent: Saturday, May 07, 2005 6:54 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com; support@theplanet.com
Subject: COPYRIGHT VIOLATION XOXOP.COM (bbs.xoxop.com (65.75.129.106)

Abiding by your legal requirements:

1. Electronic Signature JPEG is attached to this message.  I am the
    photographer and legal owner of the copyright infringed material.

2. Sets of our models Irene Fah, Becky, and Jessica.

3. Forum Root: http://bbs.xoxop.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=8
    http://bbs.xoxop.com/viewthread.php?tid=28168
    http://bbs.xoxop.com/viewthread.php?tid=28164

4. You may contact me by email at moonangel@dslextreme.com or
    by phone at (510) 763-1797

5. This is a copyright violation and  is not authorized by I, the
copyrightholder, Ryan Yu.

6. Information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, that the I, Ryan Yu is the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.


Please read a description of the copyright violation below:




                                                                        Moon
Angel Productions
                                                                        427
Lagunitas Ave #103
        
Oakland, CA 94610
        
United States
 
(510)
763-1797


 The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
 1333 Stemmons Freeway
 Suite #110
 Dallas, TX 75207
 US



Dear ThePlanet.com,

        I am the webmaster/owner of Moon Angel Productions
(http://www.moonangel.com)  Recently I have come across a site that is
hosted off of your backbone named bbs.xoxop.com  This site is a image piracy
forum that caters to Chinese Adult Imaging Pirates.  It is not only pirating
my images, but a slough of other adult sites as well.  You have been made
aware of copyright violation related to bbs.xoxop.com (IP 65.75.129.106) so
you are now excempt  from the Online Limitation Act, H.R. 2180
(http://thomas.loc.gov/cgi-bin/query/z?c105:H.R.2180:)


        The following page on this site contains two "threads" which contain
links to my images, but protected by a "point" system that promotes further
image piracy.  The forum display is here:

        http://bbs.xoxop.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=8

        The two threads are as follows:

        http://bbs.xoxop.com/viewthread.php?tid=28168
        http://bbs.xoxop.com/viewthread.php?tid=28164

        These threads contain links to "free hosted galleries" that are
setup by a hacker that contain whole sets of fully copyrighted pictures,
these pictures not only carry the Moon Angel copyright and disclaimer, but
an additional in-image watermark stating the IP and username of the hacker. 
These threads are protected by a point system so that the true owners of the
images cannot contact the freehosts to disable the galleries as they are
copyright violations to the foremost degree.

 Tracing route to XOXOP.COM [70.84.15.114] over a maximum of 30 hops:
1     2 ms     2 ms     2 ms  10.0.0.1
2    12 ms    11 ms    11 ms  netblock-72-25-90-1.dslextreme.com
[72.25.90.1]
3    11 ms    11 ms    11 ms  f0-1-1.cr1.sjc1.dslextreme.com [66.218.44.57]
4    20 ms    21 ms    20 ms  g10-121.cr1.lax1.extremetele.com
[66.51.198.81]
5    92 ms    91 ms    91 ms  eqix.lsan.twtelecom.net [206.223.123.36]
6   106 ms    92 ms   177 ms  core-01-so-1-1-0-0.lsag.twtelecom.net
[66.192.251.24]
7    92 ms    91 ms    91 ms  core-01-so-3-0-0-0.dlfw.twtelecom.net
[66.192.255.90]
8    92 ms    92 ms   124 ms  hagg-02-ge-2-3-0-506.dlfw.twtelecom.net
[66.192.253.121]
9    55 ms    55 ms    58 ms  168.215.241.150
10    55 ms   102 ms    54 ms  dist-vlan32.dsr3-2.dllstx3.theplanet.com
[70.85.127.62]
11    69 ms    55 ms    55 ms  dist-vlan-42.dsr2-2.dllstx4.theplanet.com
[70.85.127.91]
12    56 ms    54 ms    55 ms  gig1-0-2.sm-car6-13.dllstx4.theplanet.com
[67.19.255.186]
13    59 ms    55 ms    57 ms  ns45.hosteur.com [70.84.15.114]   Trace
complete.

        A traceroute to bbs.xoxop.com shows that this site is setup in
theplanet.com's infrastructure.  The IP of bbs.xoxop.com is 65.75.129.106  A
check of arin.net shows the IP is allocated to:

Managed Solutions Group, Inc. NET-MANAGED (NET-65-75-128-0-1)
                                  65.75.128.0 - 65.75.191.255 B. xingkong
NET-MANAGED (NET-65-75-129-100-1)
                                  65.75.129.100 - 65.75.129.107

        A United States IP is a ThePlanet.com customer.   A whois search for
the
domain xoxop.com comes up with fraudulent information:

    xingkong
    xk        (zhangjun77627@msn.com)
    no address
    xk
    null,524584
    FR
    Tel. +25.455478545

        As the copyright holder of the images in those above threads, I am
contacting you to take action against this customer for abusing United
States copyright laws.
Since this customer is in your infrastructure, and we are unable to contact
the webmaster of this site, we will assume that your company will take full
responsibility legally
for this customer's actions.   We are asking you to contact this customer
to cease and desist copyright infringement of Moon Angel photography, to
remove all messages and block future messages related to Moon Angel
copyright violations.  Additionally, it would be in your best interest to
look into deactivating this customer to prevent further legal ramifications.

Sincerely,
Ryan Yu
Moon Angel Productions
